questions.question: What is the predominant color of the visible surface of the product?
What appears to be the primary material used in the product's construction?
Describe the overall texture observed on the majority of the product's surface.
Considering the image, what is the apparent shape of the product's visible portion?
Based on visual inspection, what is the visible finish or treatment of the product's edges?
What type of visual pattern, if any, is noticeable in the product's texture?
Judging from the image, what is the general thickness of the visible product layer?
Does the surface texture appear smooth, rough, or something in between?
Can you describe the apparent level of sheen or gloss on the visible product surface?
Observing the image, is there any discernible pattern repetition in the fabric?
What is the apparent uniformity of the texture across the entire visible surface?
Based on visual assessment, what is the degree of visible pilling or wear?
Does the product exhibit any apparent visual defects or imperfections?
Judging from the close-up image, does the surface feel soft or hard?
Based solely on visual observation, does the fabric seem tightly or loosely woven?
